item.title: The IP address, subnet mask and CIDR notation
item.description: The Internet is a big network of devices, each of them is identified by the unique IP address. Subnetting is a process of dividing them into smaller subnetworks. Subnet mask helps us to determine which part of the IP address belongs to the network and which one belongs to us (host).

item.title: Understanding Node.js Streams
item.description: Streams in nature flow water from one side to the other, streams in programming are the same but instead of water, they flow chunks of data. It is a sequential way of handling chunks of bytes. You can achieve a lot without using streams at all, but a thorough understanding of them will make you a much better developer.
